item.title: In the Faroe Islands’ Soccer Team, the Players Also Have Day Jobs
item.description: The Faroe Islands, rugged green specks in the North Atlantic, are an underdog. Most of the guys on the team have day jobs.

item.description: In a major shift, HUD’s plan would direct most of the $3.5 billion in homelessness funds away from Housing First to programs that prioritize work and ...

item.title: Ukraine’s Dilemma as Pokrovsk Teeters: Save Lives or Keep Holding On

item.title: How the Government Will Reopen, and What’s in the Epstein Emails
I Watched This Haven From War Turn Into a Besieged Wasteland
item.description: The Ukrainian city of Pokrovsk is on the verge of becoming another shattered trophy for the Russian Army.
